name: rpgiv2free
displayName: Bob Cozzi's RPG IV to RPG Free Conversion extension for VS CODE for i
description: Bob Cozzi's Convert RPG IV fixed-format code to free-format code. Extension for Visual Studio CODE for i.

commands.title: Convert RPG IV to Free Format

configuration.title: RPG IV Free Format Converter Settings

enumDescriptions: 1 - Always convert B (binary) fields to Integer
2 - Convert to Integer only when decimal positions = 0
rpgiv2free.convertBINTOINT.description: Controls how RPG IV B ('binary') fields are converted to integers.

rpgiv2free.addINZ.description: Add INZ keyword to data structures that do not have one.

rpgiv2free.maxFreeFormatLineLength.description: Max length for converted free format lines (right margin).

rpgiv2free.indentFirstLine.description: First free format line indent/spaces (in bytes).

rpgiv2free.indentContinuedLines.description: Secondary free format lines indent/spaces (in bytes).

rpgiv2free.maxRPGSourceLength.description: Maximum record length for RPG source files.

rpgiv2free.AddEXTDeviceFlag.description: Add *EXT to DISK, WORKSTN, etc. when converting externally described files.

rpgiv2free.RemoveFREEDirective.markdownDescription:
**Remove old /free and /end-free directives**  
This will comment them out in RPG source.

rpgiv2free.ReplaceCOPYwithINCLUDE_RPG.description: Replaces /copy statements in RPGLE source types with the more modern /include directive.

rpgiv2free.ReplaceCOPYwithINCLUDE_SQLRPG.description: Replaces /copy statements in SQLRPG* source types with the more modern /include directive.

rpgiv2free.tempVarName1.description: Fixed to Free format Temp/Workfield name to generate for CAT, SUBST etc, opcode conversions.

rpgiv2free.tempVarName2.description: Fixed to Free format Temp/Workfield name to generate for DO operations.

enumDescriptions: Enable Smart Enter only for fixed-format RPG
Enable Smart Enter for both fixed-format and free-format RPG
Enable Smart Enter for all source file types (RPG and non-RPG)
rpgiv2free.enableRPGSmartEnter.description: Controls the RPG Smart Enter key behavior.

rpgiv2free.enableRPGCopySpecOnEnter.description: When RPG Smart Enter is enabled, copy the RPG spec letter to column 6 and align the cursor after it.

rpgiv2free.enableRPGSmartTab.description: Enable RPG Smart Tab/Shift+Tab navigation in RPG IV fixed-format source lines.

rpgiv2free.verticalTabColor_DarkMode.description: Fixed format RPG IV vertical columnar boundary ruler color for dark mode editing.

rpgiv2free.verticalTabColor_LightMode.description: Fixed format RPG IV vertical columnar boundary ruler color for light mode editing.

rpgiv2free.verticalTabWidth_LightMode.description: Line width (in pixels) for vertical tab stops in light mode.

rpgiv2free.verticalTabWidth_DarkMode.description: Line width (in pixels) for vertical tab stops in dark mode.

scripts.publish:all: npm run fix && npm run compile && npm run publish:ms && npm run publish:vsx
